package com.model;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

public class AccDoImplement implements AccountDo{
	
	private Map<String,Account> accounts;
	
	public AccDoImplement() {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
		accounts=Collections.synchronizedMap(new HashMap<String,Account>());
	}

	public boolean accountExists(String accountNumber)
	{
		return accounts.containsKey(accountNumber);
	}
	
	public void createAccount(Account account) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
		if(accountExists(account.getAccNumber()))
		{
			throw new RuntimeException();
		}
		accounts.put(account.getAccNumber(), account);
	}

	public void updateAccount(Account account) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if(!accountExists(account.accNumber)) {
			throw new RuntimeException();
		}
		
	}

	public void removeAccount(Account account) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}

	public Account findAccount(String account) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println(account);
		System.out.println(accounts);
		Account account1=accounts.get(account);
		if(account1==null) {
			System.out.println("null");
			throw new RuntimeException();
		}
		return account1;
	}

}
